In England, in the seven days to 07 January, there were 974,187 new confirmed cases (1,722.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 31 December, there were 943,666 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 3% (30,521 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 12 January is 12,585,787 (22,256 cases per 100,000 population).
